definitions.definition: all through a period of time

examples.text: There are extra flights to Colorado during the winter.
Please remain seated during the performance.

definitions.definition: at some point in a period of time

examples.text: He was taken to the hospital during the night.
I only saw her once during my stay in Rome.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: present participle of the obsolete verb dure ‘last, endure, extend’, via Old French from Latin durare ‘to last’, from durus ‘hard’.
